author: tabish
msg: Changed the DataOutputStream writeBytes to not append a trailing null and made the writeChars do the trailing null append.
Updated the docs on the methods to make this clear, and changed the code that was calling writeBytes to call writeChars
in the places that a trailing null was expected.
